content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 1593
May 21, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From : K. T. Li
Original signed by Secretary General, CUSA K. T. Li'
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. 484-99-471
Forwarded herewith for your processing are two draft revisions to project agreements for the subject pro- ject under fiscal years of /1960 and 1961 respectively. These revisions are to show the estimated allocations made to various recipients under the subject project for FY1960 and FY1961.
Encl. 2 draft revisions cc: 2D (with draft revisions) 4D ( " .
)
